text.text_translated: When a bridge collapses, it means it falls down. Some bridge collapses are mysteries. Engineers only understand why after they do a full study. This could happen because they used bad material when they built it. Or there was a problem in an important part of the bridge. In other cases, the bridge was designed only to support a certain amount of weight and no more.
